trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around December 23rd 2010
divs: sighting detailsi have filed a report before with you guys about a strange set of birds i filmed back in july of this year (spiritbird) that just decintegrate in mid air with an outward traveling ring of white light or energy. i sent you the video a while back. anyhow i was traveling back to calgary from edmonton, traveling south on the anthony henday highway (216) a little south of stoney plain rd. on the west side of edmonton & the next thing i know i was on a range rd. going north on the east side of the city, missed my junction to the 2 south (calgary) and can't recall how i got there. the (216) is a ring rd. that runs around the city of edmonton from nw to ne. from the west side @ stoney plain to east side to yellow head highway (16) is at least a 15 min drive @ 110 km\h. i did not feel any adverse health affects prior to or after the incedent but i was confused as to how i got there and where i was. now unless i drove for 15 min @ 110 km\h with no conciousness and negotiated multiple curves and not roll off the rd. then something else happend. for the life of me i can't recall that stretch of driving to that point. i was driving ryder rental unit 376767 from the calgary terminal and maybe there is an abnormality on the data recorder. my sense of time off too, like i wasn't even there for it.
Summary: Suspect I was abducted while Driving a Semi Truck
